ManifestName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

ManifestDescription.message: Create photo galleries from a single image based on the image name.
ManifestDescription.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

Application_Prompt_NotAValidFusk.message: This is not a valid fusk - https://example.com/[1-8].jpg

Application_Prompt_NotAValidNumber.message: This is not a valid number.

Images_ClickToOpenInNewTab.message: Click to open this image in a new tab

Images_ResizeImagesToFitOnPage.message: Resize images to fit on page

Images_ResizeImagesToFillPage.message: Resize images to fill the page

Images_GoToTop.message: Go to the top of the page

Images_GoToBottom.message: Go to the bottom of the page

Images_DownloadDialog_UniqueInfo.message: To avoid duplication, the filename will be appended with a number eg

Images_DownloadDialog_OverwriteInfo.message: The existing file will be overwritten with the new file.

Images_DownloadDialog_PromptInfo.message: You will be prompted to choose a filename.

Images_DownloadDialog_ConflictQuestion.message: In case of a conflict of filenames, what do you want to do?

Images_SaveDialog_Question.message: What name do you wish to give this fusk (defaults to this url if empty)?

Options_DarkMode.message: Show Fuskr with a dark background

Options_DarkMode_Description.message: Changes the background of image sets to a darker colour. Will take effect once you refresh pages.

Options_OpenNewFusksInForeground.message: Open new fusks in the foreground

Options_OpenNewFusksInForeground_Descrip.message: When you create a new gallery, you may not wish to open it in the foreground. By unchecking this option, any new gallery will appear in the background instead.

Options_History_Keep.message: Keep a recent history of fusks

Options_History_Keep_Description.message: Every time you create a new gallery, the extension records the created url (up to the last 10). Clicking on the url will re-generate that gallery.

Options_History_Keep_Limit.message: Last fusks. Fuskr only displays the last 10. Click to revisit.

Options_History_NoRecent.message: There are currently no records of any galleries created. When you start using Fuskr, the gallery links will appear below!

Options_Credits_Description.message:
Fuskr (originally called ChromeFusk) was created in 2011 by Dan Atkinson with oodles of help from Jonathon Bolster.

The Fuskr logos were created by Richard Stelmach of Creative Binge.

Options_About_Description.message:
Fuskr was borne of a frustation that my favourite Firefox plugin Firefusk (dead link) created by Jonathan Soma was not available for Chrome.

Once I had stopped crying, I remembered that I was a developer and could do almost anything if I put my mind to it.

Then, I remembered that I was actually a pretty rubbish developer and asked for help from Jonathon Bolster.

Jonathon gratefully helped and actually rewrote pretty much all of the code for Fuskr to make it so damned extensible and also provided lots of unit tests for it.
